expo.name: Training Wallet
expo.description: Securely store, verify, and share your professional training credentials. Training Wallet by Search Training helps you manage your qualifications, track expiring certifications, and easily share verified credentials with employers.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Training Wallet uses the camera to capture your certificate for your wallet.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Training Wallet uses your photo library to attach a certificate image to a credential.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Training Wallet can save certificate images to your photo library when you choose to.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Training Wallet uses Face ID to securely authenticate you.
